channel.title: Prayer error
channel.description:
Hi i have added prayer to my 317 source but this message appears when i try to login
[IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/7013/problemoj4.jpg[/img]
and after it dces me and i try to login again but it says account alreadu logged in
note: i think the problem is with this line: server.prayerHandler.drainPrayer(playerId);
i tried to fix it but i couldnt :S please any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 07:21:26 am[/size][hr]anyone help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2009, 07:21:49 am[/size][hr]please any help?

item.title: Prayer error
item.dc:creator: @del_piero1994 del piero1994
item.description:
@del_piero1994 wrote:

i didn’t touch playerhandler

i followed the 80% prayer tutorial in google

it compiles right…but when someone logs in…it puts the message and when u try to login again it says already logged in

hers the 2 proiblems:

public void process() {

server.prayerHandler.drainPrayer(playerId);
if(playerRights <3)
{
if((playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2572))
{
remove(playerEquipment[playerRing], playerRing);
sendMessage(“Dumbass? How did you get this ring!”);
}
}

public void initialize() {
server.prayerHandler.resetPrayer(playerId);
// first packet sent
outStream.createFrame(249);
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 1 for members, zero for free
outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId);

    // here is the place for seting up the UI, stats, etc...
    setChatOptions(0, 0, 0);
    for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
        setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);
    }

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer error
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

post your prayer code here, the drain one and etc, also you can check by your own if theres any icons that are glitched or something in the protection prayers and stuff.
if your server are not 508 dont try to add piety or chivalery, you must use 317 codes in 317 servers.
